byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Aid to Poland: Mead-Kee resolutions on Polish relief appropriation offered, Cong
snippet: WASHINGTON, Feb. 29--Former President Herbert Hoover testified today before the House Foreign Affairs Committee that between $40,000,000 and $50,000,000 would be necessary to feed 7,000,000 persons facing destitution in occupied Poland, and that f...

headline.main: HOOVER BACKS BILL FOR POLISH RELIEF; Tells House Body U.S. Should Provide Up to $20,000,000 to Help Feed 7,000,000

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Feb. 29--Former President Herbert Hoover testified today before the House Foreign Affairs Committee that between $40,000,000 and $50,000,000 would be necessary to feed 7,000,000 persons facing destitution in occupied Poland, and that from a fourth to...
